g.title: DS_TRANSMIT
g.text: if (tx_cmd != CMD_NONE) { // KLUDGE: end commit signal
simtime_t duration = b(currentTx->getDataLength() + ETHERNET_PHY_HEADER_LEN + getEsdLength()).get() / mode->bitrate;

g.title: DS_RECEIVE
g.text: CARRIER_STATUS = CRS && rx_cmd != CMD_COMMIT ? CARRIER_ON : CARRIER_OFF;

g.title: DS_RECEIVE_to_DS_IDLE
g.text: CARRIER_STATUS = CRS && rx_cmd != CMD_COMMIT ? CARRIER_ON : CARRIER_OFF;

g.title: DS_RECEIVE_to_DS_RECEIVE
g.text: CARRIER_STATUS = CRS && rx_cmd != CMD_COMMIT ? CARRIER_ON : CARRIER_OFF;
